titles: A short, but just account of the tryal of Benjamin Harris upon an information brought against him for printing and vending a late seditious book called An appeal from the country to the city, for the preservation of His Majesties person, liberty, property, and the Protestant religion.
author: Harris, Benjamin, d. 1716?
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
